summary: Customer experiencing payment failures when attempting to upgrade subscription
suggested_reply: I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with payments. This issue is often related to your bank's fraud protection. I recommend: 1) Contacting your bank to authorize transactions from our payment processor, 2) Trying a payment method from a different bank, or 3) Using PayPal as an alternative. If the issue persists after trying these steps, please let me know and I can look into it further.
